name: The Crossing Lodge
description:
We great value accommodation with a variety of room types to suit family, friends and individuals alike.
Centrally located to the Tongariro Crossing hike, Taranaki falls hike, meads walk and more.
We are a Host Less lodge, self-check in on arrival. All doors are electronic with pin codes. Support is online only as there are no staff on site or reception person. Central heating lodge wide
We also have a spacious TV lounge, pool table, a secret movie room, dining & outdoors areas, fully equipped kitchen facilities, free Wi-Fi, paid laundry facilities.

houseRules.notes:
General
The Crossing Lodge and Backpackers is a hostless lodge, meaning you will receive all required information before your arrival once full payment has been processed. Any additional information needed will be available onsite when you get there or can be obtained online. Please read any information provided to you to ensure your are properly prepared for your stay.
These Terms and Conditions will not be overridden by any verbal communications. Any variance to these Terms and Conditions is strictly at the discretion of management. These terms and conditions are subject to change without notice.
Breaching these terms and conditions may result in the offending person or group being asked to leave, in this instance there will be no refund.

Bookings
Because we are hostless we only take online bookings.
Your nominated credit card will be charged in full 5 days prior to arrival. If this transaction declines for any reason you will be contacted by email with instructions. If we are not able to successfully complete the transaction within 24 hours the booking will be cancelled.
Where a Promotion includes Non-Refundable Terms, full payment may be taken upon receipt of reservation.
Please ensure your email address is entered correctly to avoid delays in communication.

Promotions
Additional Terms and Conditions may apply to Promotions offered, as described in the Promotional media. Use of any Promotional Codes implies acceptance of those additional Terms and Conditions. eg minimum night stays, non-refundable terms, etc. Where a Promotion includes Non-Refundable Terms, full payment may be taken upon receipt of reservation.

Confirmation
You will receive a confirmation email verifying your booking details, please check them carefully and advise us immediately if they are not correct. You should have your confirmation email within 24 hours of making your booking. If you have not received confirmation in this time please first check your junk or spam folder, then send us a message through the contact us page.

Cancellations, Postponements & Alterations
Free cancellation up to 5 days prior to arrival, after then the booking is non-refundable.
Late cancellations made less than 5 days prior to arrival will not receive a refunded. A No Show will be treated the same as a late cancellation.
Postponements & Alterations can be made up to 2 days before arrival, subject to availability, seasonal rates will apply, alterations or postponements after 2 days is strictly at the discretion of management.
Please remember we are not responsible for the weather or your change of plans or circumstances.
We offer no guarantees as to the availability of the activities in the area or suitability of conditions for those activities for the duration of your stay and therefore cannot be held responsible or liable in any way. With these considerations the cancellation policy will stand.

Arrival Instructions
Upon confirmation of your booking you will be sent your Important Check-In Information. This will include details of how to find us, access to your rooms etc.

Occupancy
Each room has a maximum occupancy as described. Any extra persons found to be staying in a room or vehicle may be charged or asked to leave.

Cleaning, Loss, Damage & Disturbance
Excess cleaning will be charged at $50/hour, loss and damage will be charged at replacement or repair cost including loss of revenue. Disturbance call out, including but not limited to Police attendance, $200 for each booking involved. Property representatives reserve the right to ask any guest to leave without refund where behavior causes disturbance or discomfort to another guest, failure to comply will be treated as trespassing.

Fire Alarm
Tampering with the alarm or any other actions resulting in a false alarm will be charged to the guest at $200 per event.

Check Out
Check out time is 10am

Facilities
Facilities are subject to availability and may be closed without notice. Occasionally various facilities may have to be closed for maintenance. We appreciate your patience and understanding during these times. In these rare circumstances facilities will be restored to full function as soon as is possible.
